2 HJ Andrews library(tidyverse) library(googledrive) library(feather) library(googlesheets) # source('src/retrieval/retrieve_lter.R') print(getwd()) ## [1] "C:/Users/mrvr/Dropbox/CSU/CSU_Papers/MacroSheds_Work/data_processing" lterdir = 'data/lter/' #could totally put this part inside the function too lter_srcs = googlesheets::gs_title('lter_package_ids') %>% googlesheets::gs_read() %>% tidylog::filter(in_workflow == 1) %>% tidylog::mutate(pid_str=stringr::str_replace(id, '^(.+?-.+?-.+?)\\.([0-9]+)$', '\\1/\\2/newest/')) lter_download(src_df = lter_srcs, lter_dir=lterdir, dmn='hjandrews')
